brewery.brewery_description:
A Brewery with Tradition and Vision
For more than 150 years, we have been brewing honest, original beers with expertise handed down by craftsmen over generations. Our brewmasters continue to enthusiastically demonstrate their skill, talent and passion for producing good beer with every freshly pitched batch of wort.
In Bayreuth and the neighboring region known as Franconian Switzerland, it has long been the custom to fill bottom-fermented beers in swing-top bottles. Earlier, these Franconian specialties were lagered in cellars under the breweries, and today these beers are still aged for long periods in order to allow them to fully mature in the bottle. Two of Franconia’s most notable beer styles came about in this way: Kellerbier and Landbier.
Our beers are brewed with the finest ingredients using traditional techniques according to time-tested recipes. The honest, artisanal brewing methods and the love and attention that go into our beer are obvious from the very first sip – they are fresh, flavorful, drinkable and of the highest quality.

beer.beer_description: AKTIEN Zwick’l Kellerbier is a specialty beer with a light delicate reddish color. It is unfiltered and therefore slightly opaque. Because of this, the natural ingredients such as protein, brewer's yeast and other flavor enhancers are fully retained and manifest themselves in a full-bodied spicy flavor with finely balanced nuances of malt and bitters.

items.badge_description: One cannot live on dank hops alone. Tone down the bitterness and enjoy some smooth flavor. That's 15 different beers with an IBU of 20 or below. Try 5 more for Level 4!

beer.beer_description: Ein Bier wie seine Heimat. Ursprünglich, ehrlich und charaktervoll präsentiert sich unser AKTIEN Landbier. Ein dunkles, würziges Bier darf in Franken bei einer deftigen Brotzeit in geselliger Atmosphäre nicht fehlen und prägt damit die Einzigartigkeit der fränkischen Lebensart. Dieser Tradition fühlen sich auch unsere Brauer verpflichtet. Die erlesene Auswahl von geröstetem Spezialmalz und hellem Gerstenmalz sowie das quellfrische Fichtelgebirgswasser verleihen unserem AKTIEN Landbier seinen typischen Charakter und sein feines Malzaroma.

items.badge_description: Going for a dunk? A southern German version of the classic Hefeweizen, the Dunkelweizen is darker in color and brewed with complex malts. That's 5 different beers with the style of Wheat Beer - Dunkelweizen or Lager - Munich Dunkel. Try 5 more for Level 2!

AKTIEN Zwick’l Kellerbier is a specialty beer with a light delicate reddish color. It is unfiltered and therefore slightly opaque. Because of this, the natural ingredients such as protein, brewer's yeast and other flavor enhancers are fully retained and manifest themselves in a full-bodied spicy flavor with finely balanced nuances of malt and bitters.

Ein Bier wie seine Heimat. Ursprünglich, ehrlich und charaktervoll präsentiert sich unser AKTIEN Landbier. Ein dunkles, würziges Bier darf in Franken bei einer deftigen Brotzeit in geselliger Atmosphäre nicht fehlen und prägt damit die Einzigartigkeit der fränkischen Lebensart. Dieser Tradition fühlen sich auch unsere Brauer verpflichtet. Die erlesene Auswahl von geröstetem Spezialmalz und hellem Gerstenmalz sowie das quellfrische Fichtelgebirgswasser verleihen unserem AKTIEN Landbier seinen typischen Charakter und sein feines Malzaroma.
